
## UyghurScript pencil

### 1. facelize

> 📝:  facelize func of pencil module

> 🔙: Empty

> 🛒: 
* paper  `Loadable`


### 2. customize

> 📝:  customize func of pencil module

> 🔙: Empty

* color  `UGColor`
* rotation  `int`
* scale  `float`
* thickness  `int`
